response.summary:
My name is Gina, I am 26 years old and I am Colombian. I have plenty competences in reading, redacting, resolving problems, fast learning, communication, researching, and adapting myself fast to new environments and challenges. I speak three languages fluent: English, Portuguese and Spanish: and i have intermediate level in French. I studied chemical engineering in the Universidad Nacional de Colombia, located in the second position of best universities of the country according with the QS World University Rankings. I am currently working on green extraction methods for micro-algae lipids research as a master student on the chemical engineering post-graduation program of UFSC, program that has the highest qualification according to CAPES Agency of the Federal Government of Brazil. 
I enjoy traveling, getting to know different cultures, photography, dancing, and reading. And I have plenty interest in green alternatives, proposals, and processes related to biochemistry that could help changing the world.
response.skills: Simulación de procesos, Gestión de proyectos, Travail d’équipe, Lignes de production, Leadership d’équipe, Recherche fondamentale, Ingénierie de production, Compétences analytiques, Français, Compétences en communication interculturelle, Formation interculturelle, Communication, Parler en public, Service client, Gestion des opérations, Portugais, Ecriture, Recherche et développement (R et D), Anglais, Lecture critique

profile_positions.title: Agente del servicio de atención al cliente
